sndlib.ext.generators.gml
Class GmlCoordinatesFromNodeProvider

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.ext.generators.gml.GmlCoordinatesFromNodeProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.atesio.gml.gen.GmlCoordinatesProvider
public class GmlCoordinatesFromNodeProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.atesio.gml.gen.GmlCoordinatesProvider

Simple implementation of the GmlCoordinatesProvider interface.
The coordinates returned in getCoordinates(String) are those provided by the corresponding Node instance, i.e. by its methods Node.getXCoordinate() and Node.getYCoordinate().

If the node has NodeCoordinatesType.GEOGRAPHICAL coordinates a mercator projection is applied to convert them to screen coordinates.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
GmlUtils.projectGeographicalCoordinates(double, double)

Method Detail

getCoordinates

public java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getCoordinates(java.lang.String nodeId)
Returns the coordinates of the node with the specified ID.
If the node has NodeCoordinatesType.GEOGRAPHICAL coordinates a mercator projection is applied to convert them to screen coordinates.

Specified by:
getCoordinates in interface com.atesio.gml.gen.GmlCoordinatesProvider
Parameters:
nodeId - the ID of the node
Returns:
the coordinates of the node
See Also:
GmlUtils.projectGeographicalCoordinates(double, double)

needsScaling

public boolean needsScaling()
Returns true because the coordinates provided by this implementation need to be scaled to achieve a proper GML output.
The coordinates first will be moved to the center of the coordinates space and then scaled according to minNodeInterDistance, to be defined by GmlProperties.setMinNodeInterDistance(int).

Specified by:
needsScaling in interface com.atesio.gml.gen.GmlCoordinatesProvider
Returns:
true
See Also:
GmlUtils.scaleCoordinates(Collection, double)
